mapper.sql: type AS "type", qr_code_bind_id AS "orCodeBindId", or_code_id AS "orCodeId", source AS "source", form_id AS "formId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from or_code_bind where 1 = 1
and or_code_bind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orCodeBindId},'%')
and or_code_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orCodeId},'%')
and source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.source},'%')
and form_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.formId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
